name: Squaring
description:
Submission for the Boundless Game Jam #1 by Reece Geofroy with the theme "1 button"

========================

Play as an adorable square and dodge the enemies that are after you, but you can only control the jump button and nothing else.

=========================

Credits:

Bg music by finalgatestudios: https://finalgatestudios.itch.io/music-pack-1
